content.title: What is Certify?
content.description:
Certify is an innovative web application developed by the Informatics Engineering Student Association (HMTI) UDINUS. Designed to meet the needs of both organizations and individuals, Certify simplifies the process of generating QR codes for certificates with a strong focus on usability and efficiency.
Whether it's for organizational events, seminars, workshops, or training programs, Certify provides a seamless solution for creating secure and verifiable QR codes that can be embedded directly into certificates. With just a few simple steps, users can generate unique QR codes that allow for instant authenticity verification.
By enhancing both professionalism and information accessibility, Certify helps streamline certificate management and builds trust between organizers and recipients.

title: Getting Started
description: Getting started with Certify is easy. Follow these steps to create your first certificate:

content.title: Create an Account
content.description: To begin using Certify, you need to create an account. Visit our website and click on the 'Sign Up' button. Fill in the required information and verify your email address.

content.title: Email Verification
content.description: After signing up, you will receive a verification email. Click on the link in the email to verify your account.

content.title: Login & Logout
content.description: To log in to your account, visit the Certify website and click on the 'Login' button. Enter your credentials and click 'Login'. To log out, click on your profile icon and select 'Logout' from the dropdown menu.

content.title: Upgrade Subscription Plan
content.description: Certify offers various subscription plans to suit your needs. To upgrade your plan, log in to your account and navigate to the 'Subscription' section. Choose the plan that best fits your requirements and follow the prompts to complete the upgrade process.

content.title: Dashboard Overview
content.description: Once logged in, you will be directed to your dashboard. Here, you can view your certificates, manage your account settings, and access various features of Certify.
